--- title: "" include-before-body: text: | --- :::::: {.scenario .column-screen} :::: {.column-body .scenario-text} ## Santa Claus :::: ::: {.column-body .scenario-image} ![](images/sleigh-crash.png) ::: :::: {.column-body .scenario-text} As Cara and Jingleberry descended from the starry sky, they arrived at a clearing in the night-time forest where Santa's sleigh lay nestled among the snow-covered trees. The once-majestic sleigh, adorned with festive lights and laden with presents, was bedded deep in tangle of briars. As Cara and Jingleberry approached, Santa greeted them with a hearty "Ho, ho, ho! My dear friends, it seems I've hit a bit of a hiccup in my journey. The sleigh's harness got tangled in some flying gingerebread. I could use a bit of help to get everything back in order." "Fear not, Santa! We're here to lend a hand" said Jingleberry, and with a jangling whistle he summoned Tipsycake the unicorn. Tipsycake approached the fallen sleigh with a gently whiny and a shake of her tinsel-mane. Her horn emitted a soft glow as she carefully untangled the branches, each touch restoring a bit of the sleigh's magic. "Oh oh oh! Thank you Tipsycake!" cried Santa in delight. :::: :::: {.column-body .scenario-image} ::: {style="text-align: center;"} ### What will you choose? ::: ```{=html}
Go back
Harness Tipsycake
``` :::: ::::::
